description:
Vidiot is a non-linear video editor targeted for home video editing. It supports operations like compositing, scaling/rotating, adding transitions and titles, trimming, etc.


- Improved vertical scrolling speed when using the mouse wheel to scroll the timeline. (r3217)
- Fixed [#384]: Both Alt and Shift can be used in combination with the mouse wheel to trigger horizontal scrolling in the timeline. (r3216)
- Fixed [#383]: Crash when clicking 'preview transition' button for transition at begin of timeline. (r3215)
- Fixed [#383]: Clicking 'preview transition' button at end of timeline on triggers on playback, no repetition. (r3215)
- Fixed [#367]: File could not be opened, visual indication missing. (r3214)
- Fixed [#370]: After selecting 'freeze video' there's no option to undo this anymore. (r3213)
- Fixed [#375]: Chinese subtitles not working. (r3212)
- Removed support for saved project versions older than 0.3.32 (older than 28-10-2020). Workaround: Open with version 1.1.0 (zip version, no need to install), save and open with 2.1.0 or later version. (r3077)
